title: New Purchase Agreement Intake
description: An agent submits a fully executed purchase agreement. The transaction coordinator must review it and create a new transaction file.

tasks.description: Review the purchase agreement for completeness and key dates (acceptance, inspection, closing).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly extracts all critical dates, parties, and the property address from the contract.

tasks.description: Create a new transaction in the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new transaction file is created for the property address with all parties added.

tasks.description: Generate a transaction timeline/checklist based on the key dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: A checklist with all contractual deadlines is created and associated with the transaction.
